name: dataserializer
description: Simple data serializer for node.js  ============== ```javascript var model = { username: 'kulakowka', firstname: 'Anton', lastname: 'Kulakov', password: 'qwerty' } var rules = { 'username': true, 'fullname': function() { return this.firstname + ' ' + this.lastname; } } var result = Serializer(rules, model); console.log('Serialized data', result); // Serialized data Object {username: "kulakowka", fullname: "Anton Kulakov"} ```
